document_data.mainbody:
Husteem Villa was the family estate of the Waterdhavian noble house Husteem.
The villa was located in the western section of Waterdeeps Sea Ward on the northeast corner of where Delzorin Street joined the Street of the Singing Dolphin. The northern part of the villa also touched Sighing Maidens Walk.
The walled compound contained three separate buildings. The largest building sat on the west side of the villa. Each building was three or four stories tall.
